data.name: Prime Horror II
data.detailed_description: Prime Horror II Is a Multiplayer 8 page styled horror game with a comedic skin over it. In this 4V1 player vs monster style gameplay format you can play on either side of the ring. Play as the nefarious Joe Bozo equipped with an axe with the soul purpose of taking on a murderous rage against your opponents, Using traps, electronic discharges and the environment to win the match. Or on the other end of the coin. Team up with your friends and try to escape Joe Bozo. Using your wits and a trusty flashlight set with a multitude of ways to win. From finding all the packages (acting as the pages in a 8 page horror game) or Equipping yourself with matches and burning all of Joe Bozos cult like Totems in order extinguish him.
data.about_the_game: Prime Horror II Is a Multiplayer 8 page styled horror game with a comedic skin over it. In this 4V1 player vs monster style gameplay format you can play on either side of the ring. Or on the other end of the coin. Team up with your friends and try to escape Joe Bozo. Using your wits and a trusty flashlight set with a multitude of ways to win. From finding all the packages (acting as the pages in a 8 page horror game) or Equipping yourself with matches and burning all of Joe Bozos cult like Totems in order extinguish him.
data.reviews:
“This is silly & wacky”
Joe Himself

“Got a light?”
A Homeless Person

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel I5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel I7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
